column5: My biggest pike was 26lbs 46.5 inches long caught in June 2002 while fishing with Atlanta Dave. A sweet day indeed.
Got me a 46" toothy critter...had a 2lb Perch in its mouth....wouldnt normally let a Perch in my boat.
38 incher,,, filled the bugger up and fed it to the loonies.... used the guts for spring bear bait
We had a post about the biggest Walleye last year . How about the biggest Pike. 42.5" Lac Seul 7/15/03

Caught my largest pike ever last year. 44 1/2" ... 24 lbs. on a dead bait at Sportsman's Lodge on Little Vermillion Lake. I was fishing with my Father-in-law. We both had floats out when the wind picked up and his line started to drift into my line. I had only just cast it out. I didn't say anything, but I was sort of pissed because he cast so close to me. As I brought the bait in a large pike swiped at it but missed. I quickly dropped my rod tip about 3 ft. and it slammed it. It was incredible. I also caught a 41" 21lb pike that week. By the way it was opening weekend last year. adam P.S. I will never get pissed at my Father-in-law again for bad casts.
I know the eagles really like the big ones.My biggest feed 5 of them.My biggest walleye was 31in.(released)
44" for me. 48.5" on the net for my dad. Honsie
50+" Smirch Lake, Ontario. Biggest Pike Ive ever seen even in a photo. Day of my life. Picture is on the link below....http://www.angelfire.com/80s/lop/
42 inch....catch and release on Whitefish lake, with 14 lb fireline and a small old style kwikfish lure tipped with a worm. jake
I would never let a northern in my boat.
42in Ice Fishing Lac des Mille Lacs....Released. Biggest Walleye 30in...Ice Fishing...Released.
Try this one on for size, late August monster.http://groups.msn.com/McQonFishing/f...oto&PhotoID=41
Biggest pike so far is a 25 1/2 lber caught on a june day 2002 along with 7 more which tippped the scales at 20 lbs or more.A day of pike fishing to remember for a long time. Atlanta Dave
